pageContext.claim: In my opinion, these patriots did nothing wrong. Instead, the FBI & Justice should be investigating the terrorists, anarchists, and agitators of ANTIFA, who run around burning down our Democrat run cities and hurting our people
pageContext.analysis: Trump made this comment over a statement from the FBI confirming that the agency was investigating an incident involving a Biden bus. Trump at a campaign rally said his supporters were "protecting" the bus. But there is no evidence that is the case. In fact, our colleagues at PolitiFact rated this statement "Pants on Fire." Biden’s campaign said that on Oct. 30, a Biden campaign bus was traveling on I-35 in Texas from San Antonio to Austin "when multiple vehicles with Trump signs and flags surrounded the bus and attempted to slow the bus down and run it off the road. They pulled in front of the bus and slowed down to try to stop the bus in the middle of the highway." Staff on the bus called the police, which assisted the bus in reaching its destination, the campaign said. The campaign canceled its events that day. The FBI’s San Antonio office said that it is "aware of the incident and investigating." One Trump supporter tweeted video of the incident, saying "trolling is fun."
